channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Account
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Account

item.title: CVE-2022-30733|2024-08-03T06:56:14.016Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Sensitive information exposure in Sign-in log in Samsung Account prior to version 13.2.00.6 allows attackers to get an user email or phone number without permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-25403|2024-08-03T20:03:05.550Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Intent redirection vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 10.8.0.4 in Android P(9.0) and below, and 12.2.0.9 in Android Q(10.0) and above allows attacker to access contacts and file provider using SettingWebView component.

item.title: CVE-2022-30732|2024-08-03T06:56:14.037Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 13.2.00.6 allows attacker to access sensitive information via onActivityResult.

item.title: CVE-2022-30739|2024-08-03T06:56:14.012Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to 13.2.00.6 allows attackers to get an user email or phone number with a normal level permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-30737|2024-08-03T06:56:14.051Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Implicit Intent hijacking vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 13.2.00.6 allows attackers to get email ID.

item.title: CVE-2022-39863|2024-08-03T12:07:42.950Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Intent redirection vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 13.5.01.3 allows attackers to access content providers without permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-30743|2024-08-03T06:56:14.014Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to 13.2.00.6 allows attackers to get the data of contact and gallery without permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25825|2024-08-03T04:49:43.758Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 13.1.0.1 allows attackers to access to the authcode for sign-in.

item.title: CVE-2022-39874|2024-08-03T12:07:42.933Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Sensitive log information leakage vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 13.5.0 allows attackers to unauthorized logout.

item.title: CVE-2022-30736|2024-08-03T06:56:14.041Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to 13.2.00.6 allows attackers to get the data of contact and gallery without permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-25351|2024-08-03T20:03:05.518Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Improper Access Control in EmailValidationView in Samsung Account prior to version 10.7.0.7 and 12.1.1.3 allows physically proximate attackers to log out user account on device without user password.

item.title: CVE-2022-39875|2024-08-03T12:07:42.794Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Improper component protection vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 13.5.0 allows attackers to unauthorized logout.

item.title: CVE-2021-25381|2024-08-03T20:03:05.642Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Using unsafe PendingIntent in Samsung Account in versions 10.8.0.4 in Android P(9.0) and below, and 12.1.1.3 in Android Q(10.0) and above allows local attackers to perform unauthorized action without permission via hijacking the PendingIntent.

item.title: CVE-2021-25350|2024-08-03T20:03:05.595Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Information Exposure vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to version 12.1.1.3 allows physically proximate attackers to access user information via log.

item.title: CVE-2022-30734|2024-08-03T06:56:14.035Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Sensitive information exposure in Sign-out log in Samsung Account prior to version 13.2.00.6 allows attackers to get an user email or phone number without permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-30735|2024-08-03T06:56:14.010Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20account
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Account prior to 13.2.00.6 allows attackers to get the access_token without permission.
